Performance:
March 1976: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

Production: March 1976

Play: The Love of Ohan and Choemon (桂川連理柵)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Inn at Ishibe (石部宿屋 / Ishibe yadoya)

The Rokkakudo Temple (六角堂 / Rokkakudō)

The Obi Shop (帯屋 / Obiya)

The Katsura River in a Dim Moonlight (道行朧の桂川 / Michiyuki oboro no Katsuragawa)

Characters:

Chokichi (Decchi Chōkichi / 丁稚長吉)

Ohan (Musume Ohan / 娘お半)

Rin (Gejo Rin / 下女りん)

Choemon (Obiya Chōemon / 帯屋長右衛門)

Proprietor of the inn (Yadoya teishu / 宿屋亭主)

Maid at the debaya inn (Debaya no jochū / 出刃屋の女中)

Okinu (Nyōbō Okinu / 女房お絹)

Gihei (Otōto Gihei / 弟儀兵衛)

Otose (Haha Otose / 母おとせ)

Hansai (Oya Hansai / 親繁斎)

Servants (Genan / 下男)
